p: On the other hand, both the PON1 and ARE activities in the D + TL group were increased significantly in comparison with the D group. Moreover, Figure 1 depicts that the MDA levels did not change in the C and C + TL groups in the kidney and heart tissues, while a significant increase was observed in the MDA levels in the diabetic group. In addition, MDA levels in the heart and kidney tissues were decreased in the C + TL group compared with the D + TL group.
